body: Inside which HTML element do we put the JavaScript?
Where is the correct place to insert a JavaScript?
answer: JavaScript file CAN be insert in <head> and <body>, but is best practice to put it in the end of the <body> tag.

body: Where is best place to initialized variables?
answer: JavaScript is like 'C', is good practice to initialized all variables at the beginning.

body: What is the main object in Node
What is the result of document.write(2 + '3' - 2)
answer: The calculation is that 2 + '3' = 23 (Number) so 23 - 2 = 21 ('+' operator here don't return NaN).
